webhooks.title: GitHub Webhook Setup
webhooks.instructions: To enable automatic deployments, add a webhook in your GitHub repository:

steps.1: Go to your repository settings on GitHub (Settings > Webhooks > Add webhook)
steps.3: Set the Content Type to application/json
steps.4: Set the Secret to the value from your GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET environment variable
steps.5: Choose "Just the push event" or select individual events (Push and Pull requests)
